channel.title: CVE Feed for Johnson Controls -- KT-1
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Johnson Controls -- KT-1

item.title: CVE-2021-27662|2024-09-17T00:31:51.342Z -- johnson%20controls -- kt-1
item.description: The KT-1 door controller is susceptible to replay or man-in-the-middle attacks where an attacker can record and replay TCP packets. This issue affects Johnson Controls KT-1 all versions up to and including 3.01
